solution_line_template: On Monday, Shawna was short of {goal_situps} - {monday_situps} = <<{goal_situps}-{monday_situps}={monday_shortfall}>>{monday_shortfall} situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of {goal_situps} - {tuesday_situps} = <<{goal_situps}-{tuesday_situps}={tuesday_shortfall}>>{tuesday_shortfall} situps

On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do {goal_situps} + {monday_shortfall} + {tuesday_shortfall} = <<{goal_situps}+{monday_shortfall}+{tuesday_shortfall}={wednesday_situps_needed}>>{wednesday_situps_needed} situps
